sentences.en: And indeed, the last few words were scarcely legible.
sentences.cn: 的确, 最后几个字写得十分模糊,几乎都无法辨认.

sentences.en: Any word that's not legible will be counted as wrong.
sentences.cn: 任何无法辨认的词都将视为错字。

sentences.en: Beneath it, scrawled in barely legible handwriting was " Love, Dad ".
sentences.cn: 再下面, 潦草地写着几个几乎从不出的字: “ 爱你, 爸爸 ”.

sentences.en: He has / writes a good / legible hand.
Her handwriting was so tiny it was barely legible.
sentences.cn: 她的字写得这么小，简直都看不清楚。

sentences.en: Her voice was clear, but her face too legible.
sentences.cn: 她的声音清晰, 但面部表情却把她的心情暴露无余.

sentences.en: His countenance was overlaid with legible meanings.
sentences.cn: 他的面目上,满是可以看得出来的意义.

sentences.en: Licensed music and well designed and legible menu screens?
sentences.cn: 授权的音乐和精心设计的和清晰的菜单屏幕?

sentences.en: Please ensure that your Scanned documents are valid and legible.
sentences.cn: 请确定您的文件复印件是有效的及可辨证的.

sentences.en: The only thing legible on the torn envelope was the return address.
sentences.cn: 上面惟一能够辨认出的是破旧信封上的回信地址.

sentences.en: The price must be legible to a purchaser.
sentences.cn: 价格要写得清楚些,让买家一眼能辨认出.

sentences.en: With all the detailed personal information and a legible signature.
sentences.cn: 包括所有个人信息,个人签名须清晰易辨.

trans.tran_en: written or printed clearly enough for you to read
